xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 14 May 2013
xwikidoc.content: <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 03:17 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 03:51 <Guest75413> has joined #ccm 08:16 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 10:47 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 12:11 <Guest75413> has joined #ccm 12:54 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 15:42 <BogdanVancea> has joined #ccm 15:45 <BogdanVancea> Hello everyone 15:49 <Kushalk124> Hey 15:49 <BogdanVancea> How are you? :) 15:49 <Kushalk124> I am good :) 15:49 <Kushalk124> How are you ? 15:50 <BogdanVancea> Pretty good :) 15:51 <BogdanVancea> Have been pretty busy with my bachelor project lately, so I didn't have a lot of free time :) 15:51 <sdumitriu1> Hey 15:51 <BogdanVancea> Hello, Sergiu 15:51 <Kushalk124> BogdanVancea, Completed with ? You in you final year ? 15:52 <sdumitriu1> I'm preparing an issue for you, Bogdan 15:52 <BogdanVancea> Hehe, cool :) 15:52 <BogdanVancea> Yes, I'm in my final year :) 15:52 <Kushalk124> :) 15:52 <Kushalk124> Oh nice 15:53 <Kushalk124> Now , I am in my 4th year of studies 15:53 <BogdanVancea> And how many more to go? 15:53 <Kushalk124> 2 years 15:53 <Kushalk124> in a 5 year dual degree course 15:54 <Kushalk124> You are from ? 15:54 <BogdanVancea> Sdumitriu1, is the issue regarding medsavant? 15:54 <BogdanVancea> Kushalk124, from RomÃ¢nia 15:54 <sdumitriu1> Nope, it's going to be in PhenoTips, but it's about Solr 15:54 <BogdanVancea> And you? 15:55 <BogdanVancea> Ah, cool :) 15:55 <Kushalk124> BogdanVancea, India 15:55 <sdumitriu1> Since MedSavant doesn't have Solr yet, I'm giving you a task for a project that does use Solr 15:55 <BogdanVancea> Fair enough :) 15:56 <BogdanVancea> Kushalk124, I don't think we have dual diploma in Romania 15:56 <Kushalk124> Ohh 15:56 <BogdanVancea> Which diplomas will you be getting? 15:56 <Kushalk124> What course you enrolled in ?? 15:56 <Kushalk124> I am doing 15:57 <Kushalk124> B.E(Hons) Electronics and Instrumentation + Msc(Hons) Chemsitry 15:57 <Kushalk124> integrated course 15:57 <BogdanVancea> Nice 15:57 <Kushalk124> you ? 15:58 <BogdanVancea> Computer Science 15:58 <Kushalk124> Nice :) 15:58 <Kushalk124> What was your final project on ? 15:59 <BogdanVancea> Bachelor project focuses on information retrieval and data mining 15:59 <BogdanVancea> It's not done yet 15:59 <Kushalk124> Nice 15:59 <Kushalk124> My area of interest 15:59 <Kushalk124> IR and data mining :) 15:59 <BogdanVancea> Cool :) 15:59 <Kushalk124> Started working on it recently 16:01 <BogdanVancea> Are you focusing on anything specific? 16:01 <BogdanVancea> I'm working on contradiction detection been opinions 16:02 <BogdanVancea> And opinion search 16:02 <Kushalk124> Opinion mining 16:02 <Kushalk124> I am looking into 16:03 <Kushalk124> and text summarization 16:03 <BogdanVancea> Ah 16:03 <Kushalk124> I want to learn more on genetic algorithms 16:03 <BogdanVancea> There is this awesome book by bing liu 16:03 <BogdanVancea> That gives a model for summarising opinions 16:04 <Kushalk124> Oh 16:04 <Kushalk124> nice :) 16:04 <Kushalk124> Can you tell me the name of book 16:04 <BogdanVancea> Sentiment analysis and opinion mining 16:05 <BogdanVancea> He's got a draft of the book online, for free 16:05 <kakkse> has joined #ccm 16:05 <Kushalk124> sdumitriu1, I would try this https://github.com/compbio-UofT/phenotips/issues/391 16:05 <kakkse> HELLO 16:05 <BogdanVancea> If google doesn't show it, I'll pass a link 16:05 <Kushalk124> Oh nice 16:05 <BogdanVancea> Hello 16:05 <Kushalk124> wait would search for it 16:05 <Kushalk124> Hey kakkse 16:05 <sdumitriu1> Kushalk124: Why? 16:05 <sdumitriu1> Hey kakkse 16:06 <Kushalk124> Wanted to try one more issue 16:06 <Kushalk124> Done with that 16:06 <Kushalk124> not able to push 16:06 <kakkse> where can i find a IRC channel for CS 1.6 match? 16:06 <Kushalk124> ?? 16:06 <sdumitriu1> Counterstrike? 16:06 <kakkse> yes 16:06 <sdumitriu1> No idea, not this one 16:07 <kakkse> :( 16:07 <kakkse> has left #ccm 16:07 <Kushalk124> Counterstrike :D 16:08 <Kushalk124> sdumitriu1, I think I should start working on the new one only 16:08 <sdumitriu1> Kushal, prioritize 16:08 <sdumitriu1> You've got an important issue to o 16:08 <sdumitriu1> to do 16:08 <Kushalk124> Yes, I forgot that I have limited time 16:09 <BogdanVancea> Sdumitriu1, do you have the issue done for me? 16:09 <sdumitriu1> Not yet 16:09 <Kushalk124> BogdanVancea, Thanks Downloaded it :) 16:09 <sdumitriu1> I was waiting for some data from @marta 16:09 <BogdanVancea> Kushalk124, you're welcome 16:09 <Kushalk124> sdumitriu1, Working on the new issue :) 16:10 <BogdanVancea> Okay, l let me know when to start then :) 16:10 <BogdanVancea> Let* 16:10 <Kushalk124> BogdanVancea, I was thinking how data from PhenoTips can be used 16:10 <Kushalk124> How we can analyze the data 16:11 <Kushalk124> It might interest you as well 16:12 <BogdanVancea> Hmm, sounds interesting 16:12 <BogdanVancea> What are you thinking? 16:12 <Kushalk124> The main purpose of phenotips is to collect data 16:13 <Kushalk124> to able to predict rare genetic disorders 16:13 <Kushalk124> So I was thinking how we can contribute to it 16:13 <Kushalk124> sdumitriu1, Would be able to help us on this 16:15 <BogdanVancea> I'm not really all that familiar with phenotype, I've looked into medsavant more 16:15 <BogdanVancea> How does phenotips predict disorders? 16:16 <Kushalk124> From what I was able to understand was that 16:16 <Kushalk124> The doctor fills in the symptoms 16:16 <Kushalk124> HPO terms 16:16 <Kushalk124> which are correlated to OMIM disorders 16:16 <Kushalk124> So the best match is predicted 16:16 <Kushalk124> Thats how it help in diagnosis 16:16 <Kushalk124> Now on the research part 16:17 <Kushalk124> Collecting data from numerous patients 16:17 <Kushalk124> would help to predict rare genetic disorders 16:17 <Kushalk124> for which you need a good amount of data 16:17 <Kushalk124> hence phenotips 16:17 <Kushalk124> as anonymous data can be shared 16:17 <Kushalk124> Read last nights IRC log 16:18 <Kushalk124> sdumitriu1, explained me more on it 16:18 <BogdanVancea> Ah, ok :) 16:20 <BogdanVancea> How can I access the log archive? 16:20 <Kushalk124> phenotips.org/IRC/ 16:20 <sdumitriu1> When you log in it should be displayed in the welcome message 16:21 <Kushalk124> ? 16:21 <BogdanVancea> it gave me, the requested document could bit be found 16:21 <Kushalk124> This is the link 16:21 <Kushalk124> work for me 16:21 <BogdanVancea> Works now 16:21 <sdumitriu1> http://phenotips.org/IRC/phenotipsArchive20130513 16:22 <sdumitriu1> Starting at 21:40 16:23 <Kushalk124> sdumitriu1, What is defined it MeasurementsClass ? 16:23 <Kushalk124> I cant read it withing the application 16:23 <sdumitriu1> WDYM? 16:24 <BogdanVancea> Thanks :) 16:24 <Kushalk124> Nothing found it 16:24 <Kushalk124> in components 16:24 <Kushalk124> I was looking where the code has to be put 16:24 <Kushalk124> in Patientsheetcode 16:24 <Kushalk124> or patient-measurements 16:28 <sdumitriu1> PatientSheetCode 16:30 <BogdanVancea> Ah, I understand 16:32 <sdumitriu1> BogdanVancea: How well do you know Maven? 16:33 <BogdanVancea> Um, a 6-7 on a scale Bertrand 1 and 10 16:33 <BogdanVancea> Between 16:34 <BogdanVancea> Phone has the most interesting corrections 16:34 <BogdanVancea> I have configured some plugins, worked with aggregated poms, the basic stuff I guess 16:35 <sdumitriu1> OK 16:36 <Kushalk124> I would take a leave , too late 16:36 <Kushalk124> Sleep time 16:36 <Kushalk124> Good night sdumitriu , BogdanVancea 16:36 <BogdanVancea> Good night :) 16:36 <sdumitriu1> Bye 16:36 <Kushalk124> Talk to you tomorrow :) 16:37 <Kushalk124> sdumitriu1, Hope to find you online in 5-6 hrs :) Will work then 16:37 <Kushalk124> Bye 17:10 <BogdanVancea> I just received the email from Marta 17:10 <BogdanVancea> :) 17:11 <BogdanVancea> I'll start on 17:11 <BogdanVancea> It 17:22 <sdumitriu1> Any questions, ask here 17:25 <BogdanVancea> Okay 17:25 <BogdanVancea> Should I create a component/service for indexing from vcf files only? 17:26 <BogdanVancea> Or do I need to integrate with anything else? 17:26 <sdumitriu1> Just VCF files 17:27 <BogdanVancea> Okay :)) 17:27 <sdumitriu1> There's obo2solr as an inspiration, but I'm not sure if it's that useful 17:28 <sdumitriu1> And https://github.com/compbio-UofT/phenotips/blob/master/components/solr-access-service/src/main/java/edu/toronto/cs/phenotips/solr/HPOScriptService.java#L103 17:29 <BogdanVancea> Thanks :) 17:29 <BogdanVancea> I'll follow the same model then :) 17:30 <BogdanVancea> Have you ever considered using spring for interfacing with the data? 17:30 <BogdanVancea> For phenotips / medsavant 17:31 <BogdanVancea> ? 17:31 <sdumitriu1> Yes, but it's a very big change right now 17:32 <BogdanVancea> Yep, there are quite a few services in phenotips. 17:32 <BogdanVancea> I was just curious :) 17:33 <BogdanVancea> Well, I'm off to sleep aswell then! Thanks for the clarifications 17:34 <sdumitriu1> You're welcome 17:34 <BogdanVancea> Talk to you tomorrow :) good night! 17:34 <sdumitriu1> Good night 18:19 <BogdanVancea> has joined #ccm
